price: 221 Vous indiquerai-je sur qui en réalité descendent les démons ?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
